explanation: [0-0] A man in a red shirt and blue pants is holding a stack of boxes. Behind him is another man wearing a yellow shirt and white shorts. The background is a sidewalk lined with green trees, parked cars, and a white building. The subtitle "FALLING BOXES PRANK" appears at the bottom of the screen.

[0-3] The man shakes the boxes from side to side, suddenly tilting them to the left. Instead of falling, the boxes spill out colorful balls. The man opens his mouth in surprise, and the subtitle "Balls Edition!" pops up below.
